title: Operating Systems Assignment 2 Input
description: Schema for the input file for assignment 2

options.description: Options related to this input file

processes.description: Set of processes that wil be scheduled by the program

process_name.description: Name of the process. Used for the add_process action

process_id.description: ID of the process. Used for the remove_process action

cpu_needed.description: Number of CPU cycles needed for the process's CPU burst

priority.description: Priority level of the process. Lower numbers have higher priority

cpu_used.description: Output-only value showing how much CPU has been used by the process

scheduling_algorithm.description: The scheduling algorithm to use when the 'schedule' action is executed

scheduling_quantum.description: The number of cycles to schedule at a time (default is 1)

num_threads.description: The number of threads to use for scheduling (default is 1)
